title: Government Organizations not Far Behind in Adoption of NLP Solutions
text:
The report titled NLP Market – Government Outlook (2015-19) showcases an in-depth analysis of the market in terms of market size, application, solution, end-user, geography and technology. This report also forecasts the growth numbers till 2019 (on a YoY basis) and hence suggests the Compound Annual Growth Rate (CAGR) for the estimated period.
Dynamicity in Healthcare Industry fueling the adoption
Government organizations, especially the public sector companies of developed nations are turning towards technology to solve their various data processing issues. As we all know, many of these public limited companies and government bodies generate large amounts of data. Most of this data consists of rich information which needs to identified and transformed into actionable insights. To do this, these companies are implementing Natural Language Processing technology. Government bodies like the Census board, public healthcare and defense have been adopting these solutions actively.
Several of the government’s healthcare initiatives include use of Natural Language Processing solutions to enable patients and healthcare personnel to communicate effectively among each other and to develop effective healthcare relate cases which can be recorded and stored for future references and requirements. Another similar use of NLP is being witnessed in e-Government initiatives of the government of the USA. USA’s law enforcement authorities have been using NLP to generate reusable crime report information by extracting several key information from the crime victims in real time. NLP enables the victims and the witnesses to record real time information which is simultaneously processed and used for accurate decision making in quick time.
Most of the governments in countries of North America like the USA, Canada have been the prime adopters of NLP solutions. The level of data generated by the government bodies here forces them to use NLP to be agile and effective. Adoption is now also being witnessed in European countries like the UK and Germany. In APAC region, Singapore government has been the biggest adopter followed by the Japan and Australia.
